about_the_game:
The Premise

After being shot down and falling on a long-forgotten planet, you find our protagonist amidst hostile robots and hazards. After finding out the importance of your stolen goods the goal becomes clear. It's time to get the pieces of your ship and get out of there! Explore the levels to get the pieces of your ship. Going through the many enemies, hazards, and trials. Once you get all the ship pieces you get to leave, but can you survive?


Gameplay

The gameplay revolves around reflecting and shielding shots from enemies or hazards. Certain shots can be reflected and shielded while others you can only shield! Beware of enemies in areas of bottomless pit areas because shielding slows you down as well as takes away your ability to jump! There is a lot of risk and reward within the gameplay so be careful!

The Goal

Your goal is to survive and get the 10 pieces of your ship back. Getting all 10 pieces allows you to leave and complete the games story!

short_description: Rogue Bot Adventure is an on-rails 3D platformer. Your goal is to collect the 10 parts of your ship and escape the enemies and hazards of this mysterious planet, including robots, lasers, acid, meteors, and more. Jump, slash, and reflect using your ancient artifact.
